Public.Source: //const thElements = document.querySelectorAll('#GridContainerTbl th');		console.log(FromDate)		console.log(ToDate)				const fromDate = new Date(FromDate)		const toDate = new Date(ToDate)				console.log(fromDate)		console.log(toDate)				console.log(fromDate < toDate)		const spanElements = document.querySelectorAll('#GridContainerTbl th.WeekDay span');		console.log(spanElements)		let index = 0		while (fromDate <= toDate) {			const formatted = this.formatDate(fromDate)			spanElements[index].innerHTML = formatted			fromDate.setDate(fromDate.getDate() + 1)			index += 1		}

AfterShow.Name: Start
AfterShow.Source: this.formatDate = (date) => {			const weekdays = ['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat'];			const day = String(date.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');			const weekday = weekdays[date.getDay()];			const formatted = `${weekday} ${day}`;			return formatted;		}
